abstract: Apple’s mobile operating system has undergone a radical, huge redesign, and several apps have been updated to match the new look and feel.
snippet: Apple’s mobile operating system has undergone a radical, huge redesign, and several apps have been updated to match the new look and feel.
lead_paragraph: Consumers have been lining up worldwide to buy Apple’s new iPhones, even braving a typhoon in Japan.

headline.main: Apps That Make the Most of iOS 7
headline.print_headline: Apps That Make the Most of Apple’s New Operating System
